bookTitle: The Secret of Red Gate Farm
bookAuthors: Carolyn Keene, Russell H. Tandy, Amanda Cross, Mildred Benson
Plot: When Bess Marvin purchased an expensive bottle of Oriental perfume, she never expected to stumble into a mystery. Now Bess, Nancy, George, and their new friend Jo are out to unravel the secrets of a mysterious conspiracy, a secretive cult, and a ring of counterfeiters in The Secret of Red Gate Farm .
Characters: Nancy Drew, Carson Drew, Bess Marvin, George Fayne, Joanne Byrd, Mrs. Byrd, Reuben Ames, Alice Salisbury, Nona Salisbury, Karl Abbott
